Player History
Drafted in 4th round, 97th overall pick, by West Texas in 1979...
Traded from West Texas to Plum Grove on 6/8/1979 (Going to WT: 3B J. Calles. Going to PG: P R. Orme, P T. Soto)...
Traded from Plum Grove to New Jersey on 7/30/1979 (Going to PG: 3B W. Albritton. Going to NJ: P E. Urbina, P T. Soto)...
Injured on 4/1/1981 with a Ruptured Tricep Tendon, out for 3-4 weeks...
Earned first career win on 6/26/1983...
Had first career hit on 7/30/1985, off Arthur Franke (Min)...
Injured on 5/19/1987 with a Inflamed Rotator Cuff Muscle, out for 4-5 weeks...
Signed as a free agent by Capital City on 2/14/1989 to a 3-year deal worth $3,135,000 per year...
Traded from Capital City to Halifax on 3/1/1990 (Going to HAL: P T. Soto, 3B A. Vaca, 1B G. Riebe. Going to CC: CF G. Jacobs)...
